Public Remarks: This beautifully remodeled property is a harmonious blend of historical charm and modern convenience featuring meticulous attention to detail and high-quality finishes. This 4 bedroom and 3- bath former Victorian home boasts 2,725 SF of living space, a gourmet kitchen equipped with stainless steel Thor appliances and quartz slab countertops, primary and secondary en-suite bedrooms, and a private study/office. Energy efficiencies abound including tankless water heaters throughout, two electric car charging stations, and a 4.3 KW solar system. For added convenience, the home includes dual-zone cooling, laundry rooms both downstairs and upstairs, and a mudroom. Nestled at the back of the 7,760 SF lot is a separate 2 bedroom/2 bath 1,000 SF Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) with its own inside laundry room, perfect for multi-generational living or potential rental income. Situated just minutes away from Googleplex, Diridon Station, major freeways, Bellarmine High School, and Santa Clara University, this centrally-located property provides easy access to both work and educational institutions.
Showing Instruction: Call Listing Agent,Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

Public Remarks: English Tudor Revival home beautifully marries historic charm with modern amenities. Picture perfect storybook architecture w/ multiple gables & romantic lines. Main floor features an open floorplan of a generous great room & dining room w/ volume ceilings. Original wood burning fireplace is composed of historic fireclay ceramic tile. Updated kitchen w/ newly refinished hardwood floors, quartz countertops, farmhouse sink & Thermador 6-burner range. Paneled refrigerator & dishwasher blend in the custom white cabinetry. Ground floor bedroom & full bathroom w/ tile flooring & beadboard wainscoting. Upstairs are two bedrooms w/ attractive gable roof lines. Shared hall bathroom w/ mosaic tile floor & subway tile. In the backyard, an inviting gazebo w/ bistro lights & assortment of roses and shrubs surround the lush lawn area w/ gardening area. Oversized detached, two-car garage sits at the end of the long driveway. Conveniently located to downtown San Jose and highways 280, 680 and 87.

Public Remarks: Stately elegance and classic charm await you at 1265 Sierra Ave. Built in 1916 and appearing in Issue 54 of American Bungalow Magazine, this Craftsman proudly features intentionally original wooden details, built-ins, and Douglas Fir flooring, while being updated for modern living and comfort. This expansive, 2 story home has a convenient floor plan, with a bedroom and full bath downstairs. The den plus closet & ensuite bathroom could be an additional bedroom. The kitchen and breakfast nook offer plenty of space for serious home cooks or enjoying takeout from any of the several, top-rated restaurants that are moments away from your doorstep. A private oasis awaits you out back, featuring a detached & climate-controlled ADU/granny suite (~572 sqft) built in 2018 with a full bath and kitchen sink, a deck for al fresco dining, a sparkling swimming pool, and refreshed landscaping. Will you open the units custom carriage house doors and park your car? Will you use it as a rental, extra living space, or countless options in between? All this and more is included on the nearly 7,000 sqft lot, with new fencing and topped off with a BRAND NEW ROOF on the main home. Add its location near major employers, shopping, schools, and transit and you'll see why this home is not to be missed!

Public Remarks: Step into timeless elegance with this meticulously restored 1912 Craftsman home. Keeping its original character and charm, this gem welcomes you with a 5ft wide brick entryway and a cozy porch seating area. Inside, enjoy the warmth of a wood-burning fireplace, 9ft ceilings, and vintage lighting that illuminate the space. The dining room features coffered ceilings and French doors with sidelights, opening to the inviting front porch. The kitchen, updated just 2 years ago, boasts marble countertops, a 48 6-burner stove with griddle, a microwave drawer, and Refinished flooring throughout with a black walnut inset in the dining room, complemented by Carrara marble in the bathrooms. A new heater installed 7 years ago ensures modern comfort. Flexible spaces include an in-home laundry room/home office. Outside, the original redwood carriage house, formerly home to a classic '68 Mustang, reenvisioned into a garden cottage, fully capable of housing your favorite classic. The park-like gardens are perfect for enjoying California's seasons, with multiple seating areas to relax and unwind. This is a home where history and modern living harmoniously blend. Here's your opportunity to be the third owner of this charming home, never on the market and in the same family for over 100 years.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this exceptional, one-of-a-kind Rose Garden home, nestled on one of the most coveted streets in the neighborhood. This residence exudes grandeur with its soaring ceilings, stone fireplace in the family room, a formal dining room, & custom craftsman touches throughout. The open layout is perfect for modern living & entertaining, featuring a chef's kitchen with a dining area & new countertops & sinks, a downstairs bedroom, & an office. The large living room offers views of the lush backyard and provides plenty of space & storage with custom built-ins. Upstairs, the spacious primary suite boasts picturesque windows, walk-in closets, soaking tub & a shower. Two additional bedrooms & laundry upstairs offer convenience. Step outside to the backyard oasis, designed for entertaining with many outdoor seating areas & lush landscaping. The beautifully renovated backyard creates a tranquil retreat. An additional back auxiliary unit provides flexibility, perfect for a gym or second office. Enjoy the outdoor fireplace on cool evenings, creating a cozy atmosphere. The detached garage can be used as an additional outdoor space or game room. Conveniently located close to shopping and dining on the Alameda & the Rose Garden, this home offers the best of both luxury & convenience.
Showing Instruction: Lockbox - Supra iBox Bluetooth LE

Confidential Remarks: Inspections are super clean, no roof repairs and the only Section 1 is fumigation. All reports/disclosures available on Disclosures IO. Please schedule showing appointment on Aculist calendar. Offer due date: Wednesday, October 18th at noon. Please submit via Disclosures IO - offer instructions available there as well.
Public Remarks: Centrally located in coveted Shasta Hanchett Park neighborhood, this home was completely rebuilt in 2013 and combines charm with modern amenities. With 4 bedrooms, 2 baths you have room to entertain, work remotely, and raise your family. The huge yard has had almost $100k in professional, low maintenance, water smart landscaping, 2 gazebos and lighting. Perfect place to host parties - serve fresh veggies from your planter boxes equipped with drip irrigation or fruit from your various, mature trees. Primary suite has a slider to the back yard, great place to enjoy your coffee or favorite evening beverage. Off street parking for 2+ cars. Less than a mile to the Rose Garden, Park Station Hashery, The Alameda shops/restaurants (Peet's coffee, Luna, etc) Farmers Market, Lincoln High - magnet school for the arts. A stone's throw to Whole Foods, SAP Center, the 280, 880, train station. Home is in excellent condition - all you have to do is move your furniture in and celebrate the holidays!
Showing Instruction: Please book appointment on Aculist Calendar

Public Remarks: Located in Shasta-Hanchett Park historic neighborhood on one of the most coveted wide tree-lined streets in the greater Rose Garden district. Built in 1936, this home has 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms with tastefully appointed, architecturally superior finishes that create an ambiance and showcase old world appeal. The distinctive, one-of-a-kind interior includes a formal living room with ornate tiled fireplace, formal dining room, and kitchen nook with built-in cabinets. Downstairs have two bedrooms, half bath and full bath with console sink, shower, & tub. Upstairs has a large primary bedroom and adjoining 3rd bedroom with WC and bathroom w/ shower over tub. Also included is a laundry room, large basement, and upstairs walk-in attic. Landscaped backyard with patio area and detached two-car garage. Close to The Alameda retail and restaurants, neighborhood schools, Rose Garden Municipal Park, Zanotto's local market, freeway access to 880, 87, & 280 and so much more - A must see!

Public Remarks: Charming 1925 home close to SAP/Shark Tank, Whole Foods, coffee and shopping. Newly refinished hardwood floors, newer roof, fresh paint and new LED lighting. The kitchen has been perfectly preserved with an adorable breakfast nook and a new dishwasher. The spacious bathroom offers a separate shower and tub and shows off its original tilework. All the bedrooms offer a spacious closet and clean paint. There is a 300sf. finished basement that offers wine storage, laundry and ample space for an office, workout space or 4th bedroom. Large low maintenance yard with Trex decking, detached garage and hot tub.
